title: any been D/C from the game?
body: just got DCed from the game, cant get back in again the game started with 4 ppl only 3 on my team and 1 on their team, then at about 4 mins i got DCed too dont know about others ?

replies.body: yes, rito please i want to play

Just for a heads up, we've posted a retrospective on the issues of the last few days here, with information about what happened [here](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/XHGFrU9j-follow-up-on-connection-issues-5032015).
I was getting like black squares over the announcements and my game was being glitchy (problems with my pc) so I relogged and got firewall error and can't reconnect at all. It is frustrating.
Same problem.
Yea nah this is aids. It has happened so often in the past few days, not this big but yea.

Yup I've been Dc'ed for about 15 minutes now and I can't go back in the game keeps saying it's crashed. I hope this doesn't count as us being afk and we get punished by leaverbuster for something that isn't even our fault.
not in game but i've been frozen in champ select for the past 10 minutes

Getting dc n hell of a lag very often...fix this issue RIOT....even at loading screen getting dc...in my team 3 got dc..never came back.,.been happening for days now..do smtg asap
yeah whole team dced b4 we evn left the fountain

I still cannot connect to the game after champion selection... because of the firewall issue, is there anyone same problem?

At least once every 2 weeks, at a good point.

other times I get disconnected and I cant reconnect because im not connected to chat...
5 min ban

well i'm with Telstra, I think, and I haven't actually disconnected for long but my ping has been jumpier and jumpier since dj sona patch.
I have d/c a few times but nothing severe.

I think the worst of it was when every five seconds my champion would move half a tower distance in the place I clicked 5 seconds ago

Decided to have my first season ranking up. Get in, start playing my first ranked game ever. Winning lane as sup. Disconnected (can't connect firewall issues ect). Thanks riot. 

(will we get punished for this/ loose placement game and all that jaz?)
its a server side issue so rito "should" give everyone a loss prevented, meaning you wont lose any placements for this happening

Im in a bot game and i didnt even get out of champion select ;c 

I wish they made bot games a locally hosted thing xD i just wanted to check out some new champs{{item:1053}}
Wooooo, my dreams of ranking up crushed one d/c at a time
Over the past day I have managed to rack up 5 dc's all while this maintenance has been going on. Was on a hell of a winning streak too.
How long before i can get back into my game i got DCd and cant reconnect.
